duties_responsibilities.duty: Maximize sales by planning, order-writing, and supporting incidental activities such as merchandising, shelving, and pricing.
Develop and maintain complete knowledge of Mondelēz International, including sales systems and procedures.
Ensure leading brands are well represented, stocked, and maintained through the implementation of Mondelēz' guidelines.
Tailor programs and sales presentations based on customer needs and store demographics to drive customer growth.
Develop strong business relationships with store management to provide service beyond customer expectations.
Monitor competitive activity, report on pricing activities, and collaborate with Customer Business teams.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma / GED required, college degree highly preferred.
